channel.title: Need help! People are OVER healing!

item.title: Need help! People are OVER healing!
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

Uhh try somthing more like this
Dont forget your
public long foodDelay;

				if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("healer"))

					if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.foodDelay < 1600)
						return;

					foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
					setAnimation(0x33D);

						if(currentHealth < getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerHitpoints])){
							sM("It heals some health.");
						}

					currentHealth += 30;

					if (currentHealth > c.getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerHitpoints]))
						currentHealth = getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
						sendQuest("" + currentHealth + "", 4016);

				}

item.title: Need help! People are OVER healing!
item.dc:creator: @theyungbubba theyungbubba
item.description:
@theyungbubba wrote:

there is no compiling error. it works when you heal, but people are OVER healling…

say they got 48/9 hp… so they click it to heal, but it heals them over 99… and they can just keep clicking until they have, for example, 731/99 hp

item.title: Need help! People are OVER healing!
item.dc:creator: @theyungbubba theyungbubba
item.description:
@theyungbubba wrote:

alright, well im remaking the old server we all knew as “bronzescape”.
it was one of my favorite server’s, i do not know why,… but anyways, yah.

so i was working on healing command, and everything worked… but it will heal OVER 99…
or w/e your level is. and you can go as high as you want, depending on how much you click it.

HERE IS THE CODE I GOT SO FAR:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("healer")) if (myHP >= 98) { heal = 30; hitDiff = -heal; updateRequired = true; hitUpdateRequired = true; sendMessage("You've Heal Yourself."); stillgfx(444, absY, absX); } else if (myHP <= 98) { sendMessage("HEY! YOU'RE ARLEADY FULLY HEALED! NO NEED FOR MORE!"); }

i took some stuff off a food command, from when you eat a manta, it’ll heal you.
ater the else if
it had
“return true”
but when i compiled it said error, so i had to delete it.?? :S

Read full topic
item.source: Need help! People are OVER healing!
